meanings.definition: A type of peptide found in mucus.
meanings.sent1: The mucopeptides in the mucus help protect the body from germs.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the mucopeptides to understand their role in the immune system.
meanings.sent3: The mucopeptides in the mucus were having a party, making it extra sticky!
meanings.sent4: The mucopeptides acted like tiny soldiers, defending the body against invaders.
meanings.sent5: The slimy mucus was full of mucopeptides, like a protective shield.

meanings.definition: A compound that contains both protein and carbohydrate components.
meanings.sent1: The mucopeptides in this compound make it unique in structure.
meanings.sent2: Food rich in mucopeptides provides essential nutrients for the body.
meanings.sent3: The chef's special dish contained a secret ingredient - mucopeptides!
meanings.sent4: The mucopeptides in the compound were like a delicious blend of protein and carbs.
meanings.sent5: The mucopeptides added a special touch to the compound, enhancing its benefits.
